mapper.select:
select a.areaCode,a.name as areaName
,b.name deptName
,b.realName deptName
,count(distinct case when c.isValid=1 and c.dealType='00' then c.id end) as dealBussinessCnt, truncate(sum(distinct case when c.isValid=1 and c.dealType='00' then c.price/100 end),2) as dealContractValue, truncate(sum(distinct case when d.isValid=1 and c.dealType='00' then d.actualProfit/100 end),2) as dealBussinessConmmision, sum(distinct case when e.isValid=1 and c.dealType='00' then e.amount/100 end) as dealBussinessActualConmmision, sum(distinct case when c.isValid=1 and c.dealType='00' then (d.actualProfit - e.amount)/100 end) as dealBussinessUnreceiveConmmision,
count(distinct case when c.isValid=1 and c.dealType='01' then c.id end) as dealRentCnt, truncate(sum(distinct case when c.isValid=1 and c.dealType='01' then c.price/100 end),2) as dealRentContractValue, truncate(sum(distinct case when d.isValid=1 and c.dealType='01' then d.actualProfit/100 end),2) as dealRentCommision, sum(distinct case when c.isValid=1 and c.dealType='01' then e.amount/100 end) as dealRentActualCommision, sum(distinct case when c.isValid=1 and c.dealType='01' then (d.actualProfit - e.amount)/100 end) as dealRentUnreceiveCommision,
count(distinct case when c.isValid=1 and c.dealType='02' then c.id end) as dealOneHandCnt, truncate(sum(distinct case when c.isValid=1 and c.dealType='02' then c.price/100 end),2) as dealOneHandContractValue, truncate(sum(distinct case when d.isValid=1 and c.dealType='02' then d.actualProfit/100 end),2) as dealOneHandCommision, sum(distinct case when c.isValid=1 and c.dealType='02' then e.amount/100 end) as dealOneHandActualCommision, sum(distinct case when c.isValid=1 and c.dealType='02' then (d.actualProfit - e.amount)/100 end) as dealOneHandUnreceiveCommision from sys_dept a
right join sys_dept b on a.id = b.parentId and b.isvalid=1
right join sys_user b on a.id = b.deptId and b.isvalid=1
inner join deal_transactioninfo c on
c.permissionArea like concat(b.id,'%')
c.operatorId=b.id and c.isValid = 1
left join (select dealId,actualProfit,isValid from deal_divideninfo where isValid = 1 group by dealId) d on c.id = d.dealId
left join (select permissionArea,amount,isValid from finance_employeecommissions where isValid=1 group by permissionArea) e on e.permissionArea like concat(b.id,'%')
left join (select userId,amount,isValid from finance_employeecommissions where isValid=1 group by userId) e on e.userId = b.id
where a.isvalid=1 and c.dealTime >=#{beginDate} and c.dealTime <= #{endDate} and a.companyId = #{companyId} and a.deptTypeId= #{deptTypeId}
and c.isValid = 1
and c.isBreach = 1
and c.isFinishCase = 1
and a.id=#{deptId}
group by b.id order by b.id
